Title: Define Electronics Schema in assembly_definition.yaml
Description:
Add `electronics` section to `assembly_definition.yaml` schema.
Fields:
- `power_supply`: type, voltage, max_current
- `wiring`: from/to, gauge, length, routed_in_3d
- `components`: psu, motors, relays

Title: Implement PySpice Circuit Simulation
Description:
Integrate PySpice (Ngspice bindings) for circuit validation.
Goals:
- Validate electrical soundness (shorts, floating nodes)
- Calculate node voltages and branch currents
- Detect overcurrent/under-voltage

Title: Implement Power Supply Model
Description:
Implement standard mains/wall supply model.
Default: 24V DC, 10A (configurable).
Fail simulation if total draw > max_current.

Title: Implement Circuit Validation Tool
Description:
Create `validate_circuit(circuit)`  (python) tool for the Electronics Engineer agent.
Returns: valid (bool), voltages, currents, errors (SHORT_CIRCUIT, OVERCURRENT).

Title: Implement Wire Routing in 3D
Description:
Implement `route_wire` (python) tool for agents to specify 3D waypoints for cables.
Includes:
- Waypoint definition
- Attachment points
- Length calculation

Title: Implement Wire Physical Model
Description:
Model wires as physical objects in MuJoCo/Genesis (using tendons/cables).
Properties:
- Stiffness/damping
- Tensile strength (tearing limit)

Title: Implement Wire Clearance & Length Checks
Description:
Validation logic before simulation:
- Check if wire path intersects solid parts.
- Verify total length matches netlist definition.
- Check minimum bend radius.

Title: Integrate Circuit State with Physics Simulation
Description:
Couple circuit simulation with physics loop per timestep.
Logic: `effective_torque = controller_fn(t) * is_powered(motor, t)`.
If wire tears or power fails, motor stops.

Title: Create Electronics Engineer Agent
Description:
Define the Electronics Engineer sub-agent.
Responsibilities:
- Circuit design (netlist)
- Wire routing
- Power budget validation
- Interaction with Mechanical Engineer

Title: Add COTS Electrical Components
Description:
Extend `parts.db` with electrical categories:
- `power_supply`
- `relay`
- `connector`
- `wire` (priced per meter)

Title: Implement Electrical Failure Modes
Description:
Map simulation events to failure enums:
- `FAILED_SHORT_CIRCUIT`
- `FAILED_OVERCURRENT_SUPPLY`
- `FAILED_WIRE_TORN`
- `FAILED_OPEN_CIRCUIT`

Title: Implement Frontend Visualization
Description:
Add UI support for electronics:
- Schematic view (from netlist)
- 3D wire visualization (colored tubes)
- Circuit timeline (motor ON/OFF states)

Title: Define Electronics Requirements Schema in objectives.yaml
Description:
Add `electronics_requirements` section to `objectives.yaml` schema for PSU location and wiring constraints.
Fields:
- `power_supply_available`: location
- `wiring_constraints`: max_length, restricted_zones
- `circuit_validation_required` flag

Title: Implement Transient Simulation Tool
Description:
Create `simulate_circuit_transient` tool.
Input: circuit, duration, timestep.
Output: transient analysis results (motor states over time).

Title: Implement Power Budget Tool
Description:
Create `calculate_power_budget` tool.
Input: circuit, motors.
Output: total draw vs PSU capacity, margin.

Title: Implement Engineering Workflow Handoffs
Description:
Implement LangGraph nodes for:
1. Mech -> Elec handoff (assembly, space).
2. Elec -> Mech handoff (wired assembly).
3. Conflict resolution loop (if wiring fails constraints).

Title: Implement Electronics Evaluation Benchmarks
Description:
Create validation scenarios:
- Fast: parsing, wiring script execution.
- Medium: circuit validity, wire clearance.
- Slow: end-to-end electromechanical solution success rate.
